results.deck: Gunfighter II: Revenge of Jesse James is the second game in the Gunfighter light gun series.
results.name: Gunfighter II: Revenge of Jesse James

results.deck: SSX Tricky is the second game in the SSX franchise and was released under the now-defunct EA Sports Big label. Tricky is the first game in the series to feature Uber Tricks.
results.name: SSX Tricky

results.deck: The X Factor Sing is based on the popular British TV show lets the player experience the thrill of singing in front of a live audience from the comfort of there living room. The game uses a microphone peripheral similar to Singstar.
results.name: The X Factor Sing

results.deck: AFL Premiership 2007 is based on the popular sport of Australian Rules Football.  It features all 16 AFL teams as well as their stadiums.
results.name: AFL Premiership 2007

results.deck: The Hustle: Detroit Streets is a billiards game for the Xbox, PSP, and Playstation 2.
results.name: The Hustle: Detroit Streets

results.deck: Mix and match various mobile suits from the Gundam franchise in this turn-based RPG.
results.name: MS Saga: A New Dawn

results.deck: Become like the greatest manager in English football and possibly the world.
results.name: Alex Ferguson's Player Manager 2001

results.deck: Play as Cate Archer, an operative for UNITY, as she battles against an evil plot hatched by the global terrorist organization, H.A.R.M. in the groovy 1960s.
results.name: The Operative: No One Lives Forever
Versailles II: Testament of the King

results.deck: A hack and slash game based on the 2005 movie of the same name.
results.name: King Arthur

results.deck: Malice, a goddess with help from The Metal Guardian, must stop the Dog God from destroying her world and the Universe. Armed with a giant club, she must find eight logic keys to track the Dog God down.
results.name: Malice

results.deck: One of the first games to utilize a Bob and Weave mechanic, Victorious boxers is more than a simple anime license cash in.
results.name: Victorious Boxers: Ippo's Road to Glory

results.deck: Play as a nameless Spartan waging war against the Roman Empire in Greco-Roman locations such as Sparta, Athens, the fabled city of Troy and eventually Rome it self in this spin-off game of the Total War series.
results.name: Spartan: Total Warrior

results.deck: Planetarian is a Japanese, all ages post-apocalyptic visual novel developed by Key and released for PC over the internet on November 29, 2004. It was later re-released with full voice acting in CD and also ported to PlayStation 2, PSP, mobile phones in 2006 and Nintendo DS release which is only available in chinese called xing zhi meng DS.
results.name: Planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet

results.deck: Thrillville is a theme park management game with minigames from the creators of RollerCoaster Tycoon 3.
results.name: Thrillville

results.deck: In 2010, catastrophe strikes the city of Del Ray as the levees that protect the municipality fail and the Cascade Lake begins to drown the city.
results.name: Raw Danger

results.deck: The fourth installment of Konami's long-running RPG series Suikoden. In this game, set 150 years prior to the original Suikoden, players will begin an adventure through the rough seas of the Suikoden universe's Island Nations.
results.name: Suikoden IV

results.deck: Hop and bop your way through the second installment of the ATV Offroad Fury franchise.
results.name: ATV Offroad Fury 2

results.deck: Super Bust-A-Move is a puzzle game developed by Taito Corporation.  It was released on the Playstaion 2 and the PC on November 20, 2000.  It was later ported to the Gameboy Advance on November 27, 2001.
results.name: Super Bust-A-Move

results.deck: Blast your way through jungle infested, nazi-esque worlds in this compilation of the Metal Slug franchise.  Includes every arcade Metal Slug game, which makes this game Metal Slug 6's Western debut.
results.name: Metal Slug Anthology

results.deck: Top Spin is a realistic tennis simulator available for the Xbox, Playstation 2, and the PC.
results.name: Top Spin

results.deck: Action packed ATV racing.
results.name: ATV Offroad Fury

results.deck: Total Club Manager 2004 is a sports simulation game in which you are a manager in charge of a soccer club and you take your team game by game through up to ten seasons.
results.name: Total Club Manager 2004

results.deck: A cel-shaded vehicular combat game.
results.name: Cel Damage

results.deck: The fifth game in the Suikoden series. Set six years before Suikoden I, the game follows the Prince of the Queendom of Falena, as he struggles to unite the 108 Stars of Destiny and end a civil war that threatens to tear the realm apart.
results.name: Suikoden V

results.deck: Invictus Thrax a Warrior Slave is chosen by the Gods to save the Roman Empire.
results.name: Gladiator: Sword of Vengeance

results.deck: B.J. Blazkowicz returns to fight elite Nazi troopers, supernatural creatures, and mechanized super soldiers in this reboot of the original 1991 classic Wolfenstein 3D.
results.name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein

results.deck: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3 revolves around saving the outback from the Quinkan invaders. The third game in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series was also the first to be published by a company other than EA Games.
results.name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan

results.deck: Forge your destiny in a land of Legends as you team up with friendly people from around the world to fight monsters, complete challenging quests and explore dangerous and spectacular frontiers.
results.name: EverQuest Online Adventures: Frontiers

results.deck: Set eighteen years after the original Drakengard, the young warrior Nowe and Legna, the dragon that raised him, are pulled into a conflict when a group of rebels threaten the seals that hold the world's balance in check.
results.name: Drakengard 2

results.deck: A light gun game developed for the Playstation 2 in 2001. the game was originally an arcade game and was released in 2000 and later ported to the Playstation 2.
results.name: Vampire Night

results.deck: The first in a long-running revision history of Guilty Gear X2 adds numerous gameplay balance changes and is the first in the franchise to feature online multiplayer (in its the Xbox version).
results.name: Guilty Gear XX #Reload

results.deck: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds is a third-person action game, released for several consoles in 2003. Chaos Bleeds lets you play as several characters from the show, in an all-new adventure written specifically for the game. Among others, Eliza Dushku and James Marsters voice their TV-characters in the game.
results.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds

results.deck: Headhunter was released for the Sega Dreamcast November 16th 2001, and the Sony PlayStation 2 May 9th 2002.  Headhunter takes place in a near future Los Angeles and tells the story of Jack Wade, a professional bounty hunter.
results.name: Headhunter

results.deck: FIFA 08 is the 2008 installment of Electronic Arts' series of football video games. It was developed by EA Canada.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 08

results.deck: The Rise of Zilart is the first expansion in the Final Fantasy XI Online series.  It adds many new features such as three new jobs, new summonable avatars, over 30 new areas, new quests and missions.
results.name: Final Fantasy XI Online: Rise of Zilart

results.deck: In Ape Escape 3, you can try to stop another attempt by Specter and his evil monkeys to rule the world. Use nets and other weapons to capture  monkeys.
results.name: Ape Escape 3

results.deck: The first PlayStation 2 entry in the Hot Shots Golf series.
results.name: Hot Shots Golf 3

results.deck: Shadow's first self-titled adventure, Shadow the Hedgehog, became one of the most controversial games in the series, due to its darker and edgier nature, and the fact that Shadow is able to wield guns.
results.name: Shadow the Hedgehog
World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions

results.deck: NHL Hitz 20-03 is the second release of Midway's arcade style hockey series.
results.name: NHL Hitz 20-03

results.deck: The game takes control over a orphan called Cyprien, who is taken to a nightmarish world and possesses the ability to transform into a Super version of himself.His alter-ego, Supercyp aids him in his journey to Loren Darith to free his teddy bear, Lenny. This game was Europe release only.
results.name: Evil Twin: Cyprien's Chronicles

results.deck: Tarzan Untamed is an action game released in 2001 and was a Gamecube launch title.
results.name: Disney's Tarzan Untamed

results.deck: This minigame collection let's you play as cast members from Jackass, as they do crazy stunts.
results.name: Jackass: The Game

results.deck: A hunting based first person shooter published by Activision.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts

results.deck: Auto Modellista is a cel-shaded, self-titled "driving simulator" by Capcom.
results.name: Auto Modellista

results.deck: Piglet's Big Game puts the character of Piglet on center stage in A.A Milne's world of 'Winnie the Pooh'.
results.name: Piglet's Big Game

results.deck: Starring the red-headed protagonist Adol Christin, Ys: The Ark of Napishtim is the sixth game in the long-running action RPG series.
results.name: Ys: The Ark of Napishtim

results.deck: World Heroes 2 is a 2D fighting game by ADK for the Neo Geo. The second game in the series features new characters and gameplay elements along with a revamped Death Match system.
results.name: World Heroes 2

results.deck: Cold Fear is a survival horror game by Ubisoft where you play as Tom Hansen, a U.S. Coast Guard sent out to board a drifting Russian whaling ship in the middle of a howling storm on the Bering Sea. Things quickly go sour and Tom must fight to survive.
results.name: Cold Fear

results.deck: Redcard 20-03 is an action sports game that revolves around soccer. The game features 50 International teams and 11-on-11 gameplay.
results.name: RedCard 20-03

results.deck: An action adventure game based on the disney film Chicken Little where you control the likes of Chicken Little, Abby Mallard, Runt of the litter as you fight off an alien invasion. Along with a the core platforming elements, the game features unlockable mini-games and concept art.
results.name: Disney's Chicken Little

results.deck: War of the Monsters is a 3D fighting game styled after old-school 'creature feature' films of the '50s and '60s, with a variety of playable characters inspired by movie monsters from that era.
results.name: War of the Monsters

results.deck: XGRA: Extreme G Racing Association is a futuristic, weapon-based racing game, similar to F-Zero and the WipEout franchises.
results.name: XGRA: Extreme G Racing Association

results.deck: RC Cars is a RC Car racing game developed by Creat Studio, released on the 11th of December, 2003.
results.name: RC Cars

results.deck: Commandos 2 is a historically based stealth-action game Developed  by Pyro Studios in 2001.  You control a variety of elite commandos in an attempt to thwart the Axis powers throughout WW2.
results.name: Commandos 2: Men of Courage

results.deck: A mysterious deadly mist is ravaging the land of Solum, and the Imperial Legion soldier Spero and his companions adventure the land to stop it.
results.name: Stella Deus: The Gate of Eternity

results.deck: The clash of two American titans: the power of General Motors collides with Ford Motor Company in a battle for supremacy.
results.name: Ford Vs. Chevy

results.deck: Have you Frolfed today? Send frogs careening around bizarre courses littered with power-ups, danger, and distractions to rack up points or go for the elusive and high-scoring Frog-in-One!
results.name: Ribbit King

results.deck: One Piece: Pirates' Carnival is a PlayStation 2 and GameCube action game based on the One Piece anime series.
results.name: One Piece: Pirates' Carnival

results.deck: Summoner is a realtime role-playing game from Red Faction creators Volition.
results.name: Summoner

results.deck: Onimusha 2 brings us back to feudal Japan to battle Nobunaga once again. This entry introduces a friendship system that can drastically alter story scenes and result in different playable characters.
results.name: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny

results.deck: Become the Hulk and turn the world into the ultimate plaything in this superhero action game from Radical.
results.name: The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction

results.deck: A scrolling shooter for the Dreamcast, Gunbird lets you choose one of seven characters, from a magician to a combat android, to battle God (oddly an elephant) and his angels (actually an army of frogs).
results.name: Gunbird 2

results.deck: Falling stars is a role playing videogame, developed by Ivolgamus and published by Agetec.
results.name: Falling Stars

results.deck: Lifeline is a game for the Playstation 2 in which players use a unique voice command system to help two people survive an alien invasion.
results.name: Lifeline

results.deck: Based on the animated movie of the same name with variations in gameplay depending on the platform version
results.name: Monster House

results.deck: A winter sports game.
results.name: ESPN International Winter Sports 2002

results.deck: Mister Mosquito is a quirky third-person "fly"ing game published by FreshGames and Eidos. Winter is coming and Mr. Mosquito needs to store enough blood to survive! Pester the hapless Yamada family and suck enough of their blood to survive the winter ahead!
results.name: Mister Mosquito

results.deck: The third installment of the NFL Street series.
results.name: NFL Street 3

results.deck: Continuing the series, Colin McRae Rally 3 is a racing game that both simulaton and arcade racing fans can enjoy.
results.name: Colin McRae Rally 3

results.deck: NASCAR: Dirt to Daytona is a Nascar racing game developed by Monster Games and published by Infogrames in November 2002 for the PlayStation 2 and Nintendo GameCube.
results.name: NASCAR: Dirt to Daytona

results.deck: Armored Core 2 is the second Mecha combat game in the Armored Core series and unlike the future games in the series, stays within the story universe of its predecessor.
results.name: Armored Core 2

results.deck: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen is a fantasy RPG and sequel to the JRPG Seven: The Calvary of Molmoth, Venus & Braves.
results.name: Venus & Braves: Majo to Megami to Horobi no Yogen

results.deck: 7 Sins was a PC and PS2 game, rated 18 for it's Mature content. The game is essentially a dating sim.
results.name: 7 Sins

results.deck: The fifth game in the Sakura Taisen franchise and the first to receive an official North American localization, courtesy of NIS America.
results.name: Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love

results.deck: A remake of the classic Playstation title. Return to the legendary realm of Filgaia where an evil force from ancient prophecies threatens to destroy all life on the planet.
results.name: Wild Arms Alter Code: F

results.deck: Race Formula One cars just like Sly Stallone in the film of the same name.
results.name: Driven

results.deck: A 3D platformer staring everyone's favourite ghost buster, Pac-Man.
results.name: Pac-Man World 2

results.deck: AMF Xtreme Bowling is a bowling game for the Playstation 2 and Xbox.
results.name: AMF Xtreme Bowling

results.deck: Help Woody Woodpecker rescue nephew Knothead and niece Splinter, then escape from Buzz Buzzard's park.
results.name: Woody Woodpecker: Escape from Buzz Buzzard Park

results.deck: Friend or Foe is a beat 'em up where Spider-Man teams up with his enemies to save the day and stop an unknown nemesis.
results.name: Spider-Man: Friend or Foe
